name: Teleport
description: The next two cards that your opponent plays are suspended until next turn.

hooks.OnPlay: if (!State.ContainsKey("suspended")) State["suspended"] = 0; if ((int)State["suspended"] < 2 && Card != null) { Battle.SuspendedCards.Add(Card); Card = null; State["suspended"] = (int)State["suspended"] + 1; Log("Card suspended by Teleport!"); if ((int)State["suspended"] >= 2) RemoveStatus(); }
